title: Lightning Bolt - Ride The Skies (Apple Lossless)
description:
This is the direct cd rip of the album "Ride The Skies" by the noise band "Lightning Bolt." The album was ripped into Apple Lossless (.m4a) to keep lossless quality and perfection. The files can easily be converted to any other similar lossless format (like .flac if you dont use itunes).

Ride the Skies is the second album by noise rock band Lightning Bolt. This album is considered their breakthrough in the noise rock world.
